name: Gravity Forms Klaviyo Add-On
author: Gravity Extra

sections.description:
Supercharge your email marketing with Klaviyo and Gravity Forms!

Free Version Features:

The Gravity Forms Klaviyo Add-On enables you to seamlessly connect your Gravity Forms with Klaviyo, a powerful email marketing platform. The free version offers basic integration capabilities, including:

  • Basic Contact Sync: Automatically send form submissions from Gravity Forms to Klaviyo, capturing essential contact information for your email marketing campaigns.
  • Limited Field Mapping: Map only the Name and Email fields from Gravity Forms to Klaviyo to start building your contact list.
  • Single List Addition: Add new contacts to a specific Klaviyo list directly from your Gravity Forms submissions.

This free version is perfect for users looking to get started with basic email marketing integrations using Gravity Forms and Klaviyo.

Unlock More with the Premium Version:

Ready to unlock the full potential of your email marketing with Klaviyo? Upgrade to the Premium Version of the Gravity Forms Klaviyo Add-On and access a range of advanced features:

  • Multiple Listings Configuration: Configure multiple mappings between Gravity Forms and Klaviyo to target different audience segments effectively.
  • Custom Fields Mapping: Map any custom fields from Gravity Forms to Klaviyo, allowing for enhanced personalization and detailed segmentation.
  • Multiple Feeds Support: Connect multiple Gravity Forms feeds to Klaviyo for versatile data management and integration setups.
  • Conditional Logic: Set conditional rules to control when and what data is sent to Klaviyo, optimizing your marketing workflows.
  • Email & SMS Consent Fields: Create and map Gravity Forms fields to Klaviyo’s email and SMS consent fields, ensuring compliance with privacy regulations.
  • Event Metrics Tracking: Automatically create event metrics in Klaviyo whenever a contact is created or updated, providing deeper insights into customer interactions.

Upgrade now to transform your Gravity Forms into a powerful marketing tool that integrates seamlessly with Klaviyo!

ðŸ‘‰ Click here to learn more and get the Premium Version!

Watch the Instructional Video:

To see how easy it is to set up and use the Gravity Forms Klaviyo Add-On, check out our detailed instructional video on YouTube:

ðŸ“º Watch the Video Tutorial Here

This video provides step-by-step guidance for both the free and premium versions, helping you get the most out of the integration with Klaviyo.

Access Premium Documentation:

Need more detailed guidance? Explore the comprehensive documentation for the premium version to maximize your use of advanced features with Klaviyo:

ðŸ“– Read the Premium Documentation Here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gf-klaviyo-add-on directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to Forms > Settings > Klaviyo to configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Major update: Enhanced plugin description, added instructional video and documentation links, and updated Klaviyo references.
  • Updated Klaviyo API endpoints to the latest version for improved integration and performance.
  • Fixed various bugs to enhance stability and reliability.
